table.c: ##订单信息在金蝶是否发货查询
table.name: SYNC_ORDER
table.stmt: SELECT FHeadSelfB0170, FStatus, FHeadSelfB0165 FROM [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[ICStockBill] WHERE FHeadSelfB0170 is not null AND FHeadSelfB0170 <>'' AND FCancellation=0 AND fdate is not null AND fdate>DateAdd(day,?,GETDATE()) AND FStatus=1
